# Chickpea Salad

A tasty summer salad with chickpeas.

## Ingredients

* 1 can chickpeas
* 1/2 red onion, thinly sliced
* 1/2 cucumber, chopped
* 1 red capsicum, roasted
* 3 tomatoes, chopped
* 2 tbsp parlsey
* 2 cloves garlic
* 3 tbsp lemon juice
* 2 tsp oil
* 1/4 tsp salt

## Method

Combine: chickpeas, red onion, cucumber, red capsicum, tomatoes, parsley and crushed garlic in a bowl.

Dressing: Combine lemon juice, oil and salt. Whip until emulsified.

Pour dressing over salad ingredients.
